r.d: Net_Socket is a class interface to TCP sockets. It provides blocking and non-blocking operation, with different reading and writing modes (byte-wise, block-wise, line-wise and special formats like network byte-order ip addresses).
r.n: - Fixing bug #6789: Net_Sock::eof() returns false when socket is already disconnected - Using package.xml v2.0 - Fixing request #3327: Method for setting Socket's write buffer size - Add enableCrypto() for calling stream_socket_enable_crypto with PHP 5.1.0+
